TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FeatureSupport extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport
Public MustInherit Class FeatureSupport Implements IFeatureSupport
public ref class FeatureSupport abstract : System::Windows::Forms::IFeatureSupport

summary.span: 提供 方法，以便從目前的系統擷取功能資訊。

span.span: Provides methods for retrieving feature information from the current system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`static`您查詢的類別功能的資訊時，這個類別的方法實作介面。Use the `static` methods of this class when the classes you query for feature information implement the interface. 否則，繼承自並提供您自己的實作。Otherwise, inherit from and provide your own implementation. 這個類別的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this class, see . 若要取得之功能的版本號碼，請呼叫。To get the version number of a feature, call . 呼叫來判斷是否已安裝特定功能或功能的版本。Call to determine if a particular feature or version of a feature is installed. ## Examples 下列範例會使用實作查詢功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 版本會檢查以查看它是否`null`，以判斷是否有此功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 結果會顯示在文字方塊中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已經建立，並在表單上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 當您繼承自，您必須覆寫方法。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the method.

para.span: 當您覆寫這個方法時，請確認您用於類別參數是用於此參數中的類別相同方法。

span.span: When you override this method, check that the class that you use for the parameter is the same as the class used for this parameter in the method.

para.span: 如果兩個參數不同，您也必須覆寫。

span.span: If the two parameters differ, you also must override .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 擷取系統上可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Version GetVersionPresent (object feature);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Version GetVersionPresent(object feature) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetVersionPresent (feature As Object) As Version
public: abstract Version ^ GetVersionPresent(System::Object ^ feature);

span.span: The feature whose version is requested.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，請取得系統上可用的指定功能版本。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.

returns.span: ，表示系統上可用的指定功能的版本號碼，如果功能並未安裝，則為 。

span.span: A representing the version number of the specified feature available on the system; or if the feature is not installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本號碼是由三個部分所組成： 主要和次要、 組建。Version numbers consist of three parts: major, minor, and build. 一般而言，版本號碼會顯示為 「 主要版本號碼數字 」。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用實作查詢功能。The following code example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 版本會檢查以查看它是否`null`，以判斷是否有此功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 結果會顯示在文字方塊中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此程式碼需要`textBox1`已經建立，並在表單上。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 擷取系統上可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.

returns.span: ，具有系統上可用的指定功能的版本號碼，如果功能並未安裝，則為 。

span.span: A with the version number of the specified feature available on the system; or if the feature is not installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本號碼是由三個部分所組成： 主要和次要、 組建。Version numbers consist of three parts: major, minor, and build. 一般而言，版本號碼會顯示為 「 主要版本號碼數字 」。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number". 請參閱包含的功能，以判斷要傳遞至名稱的產品文件`featureClassName`和`featureConstName`參數。See the documentation for the product containing the feature to determine the names to pass to the `featureClassName` and the `featureConstName` parameters.

summary.span: 決定指定的功能是否安裝在系統中。

span.span: Determines whether the specified feature is installed in the system.

param.name: minimumVersion
param.span: ，表示所要尋找之功能的最小版本號碼。

summary.span: 決定系統中是否已經安裝指定功能的指定或較新的版本。

span.span: Determines whether the specified or newer version of the specified feature is installed in the system.

returns.span: 如果功能出現並且版本號碼大於或等於指定的最小版本號碼，則為 ，如果沒有安裝此功能或版本號碼低於指定的最小號碼，則為 。

span.span: if the feature is present and its version number is greater than or equal to the specified minimum version number; if the feature is not installed or its version number is below the specified minimum number.
